content.text:
# 2002 St. George Illawarra Dragons season

|league=NRL|league_champions=|league_draws=3|league_losses=12|league_rank=7th|league_wins=9|list=|next_season=2003|playoff_result=Semi-finals|points_against=546|points_for=632|prev_season=2001|stadium=Sydney Football Stadium,
Wollongong Showground|top_goals=|top_points=Mark Riddell (129)|top_tries=Lee Hookey (18)|year=2002}}The 2002 St. George Illawarra Dragons season was the fourth in the joint venture club's history. The Dragons competed in the NRL's 2002 premiership season. The team finished seventh in the regular season, making finals but getting knocked out in the second week against the Cronulla-Sutherland Sharks, losing 40–24.
